meanings.sent1: The mechanic inspected the underbody of the car for any signs of rust.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to clean the underbody of your vehicle regularly to prevent corrosion.
meanings.sent3: The underbody of the car seemed to be hiding a secret compartment.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed under the underbody of the truck, making it seem like a giant drum.
meanings.sent5: The underbody of the vehicle was so shiny, it reflected the sunlight like a mirror.

meanings.definition: The lower part of a structure or object.
meanings.sent1: The underbody of the building was reinforced to withstand earthquakes.
meanings.sent2: The underbody of the boat was painted blue to match the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The underbody of the cake was surprisingly more delicious than the top layer.
meanings.sent4: His ideas formed the underbody of the project, providing a strong foundation.
meanings.sent5: The underbody of the tree was covered in moss, giving it a mystical appearance.
